prompt: Evaluate inclusive education practices and analyze strategies to support students with diverse learning needs in mainstream classrooms.

criteria.name: Understanding of Inclusive Education Principles
criteria.description: Evaluates knowledge of inclusive philosophy and frameworks such as Universal Design for Learning (UDL).

performance_descriptors.excellent: Clearly explains inclusion principles and UDL with classroom application examples.
performance_descriptors.good: Describes the main concepts with some practical connections.

criteria.name: Analysis of Diverse Learner Needs
criteria.description: Assesses understanding of cognitive, physical, emotional, and cultural diversity among students.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Insightfully analyzes diverse needs and their educational implications.
performance_descriptors.good: Clearly explains several types of needs with examples.

criteria.name: Instructional Strategies and Accommodations
criteria.description: Evaluates evidence-based teaching strategies and accommodations.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Justifies multiple differentiated strategies and accommodations with research.
performance_descriptors.good: Provides some appropriate strategies backed by examples.

criteria.name: Collaboration among Stakeholders
criteria.description: Analyzes collaborative roles of teachers, specialists, families, and communities.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Thoroughly explains partnerships and collaborative practices.

criteria.name: Academic Writing and Organization
criteria.description: Assesses clarity, organization, and formal tone.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Highly structured, clear, and academic writing.

key_points: Explain key inclusion principles including UDL and social inclusion.
Analyze different types of learner diversity and their classroom impact.
Present evidence-based differentiation, accommodations, and assistive technologies.
Emphasize collaborative partnerships among educators, families, and specialists.
Provide a logically coherent and well-written academic essay.
llm_questions: What are the foundational principles of inclusive education?
How can UDL be applied in mainstream classrooms?
What are common diverse learner needs?
How do teachers adapt instruction for diverse students?
What roles do families and specialists play in inclusion?
How important is classroom culture in inclusive education?
